name: fintech-demo
description: NDA-safe FinTech demo: deterministic finance + agentic AI

scripts.db:migrate: psql $DATABASE_URL -f db/schema.sql 2>/dev/null || set PGPASSWORD=postgres && psql -h localhost -U postgres -d fintech_demo -f db/schema.sql
scripts.db:seed: psql $DATABASE_URL -f db/seed.sql 2>/dev/null || set PGPASSWORD=postgres && psql -h localhost -U postgres -d fintech_demo -f db/seed.sql
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
